name: wandering through oniria
description:
(any key to continue and mouse for options)

Deneb has been walking for what it feels forever. Join them in their strange encounter with Sirio. Hopefully, this will help them to find themselves.

Sirio and Deneb are two of the brighter stars in the northern hemisphere. Sirio can only be seen in winter, so they appear together in the night sky for a short period of time, some say they talk to each other during those nights.

Originally made for the Global Game Jam Online 2021, although we didn't make it to the deadline. 

Sound with creative commons from freesound.org

By Laura and Germán
